name: Overdue Request
query:
SELECT distinct rf.name as 'Request Number:Link/Request Form:150',
rf.file_number as 'File Number:Data:150',
rf.full_name as 'Full Name:Read Only:200',
rf.date_of_request as 'Date of Request:Date:100',
 DATEDIFF(NOW(),date_of_request) as 'Overdue:Int:150',
rt.researcher_name as 'Researcher Name'
FROM `tabRequest Form` rf LEFT JOIN `tabResearcher table` rt  ON rt.name = (SELECT trt.name
    FROM `tabResearcher table` trt
    WHERE rf.name = trt.parent 
    AND idx = 1
    LIMIT 1)
WHERE DATEDIFF(NOW(),date_of_request) >= 30 
AND rf.workflow_state IN ('Initiate', 'Review Request', 'Awaiting Researcher', 'Approved By Researcher')
